name: Hot Potato
description: After your character uses Skill: This effect will be transferred to the opposing side and accumulate 1 point of Piping Hot (max 4 points). End Phase: Remove this effect and deal 2 Physical DMG to the side where this effect is attached to. Each point of Piping Hot grants +1 DMG to this effect.

Each point of Piping Hot grants +1 DMG to this effect.
